message.body: Hi! Can you text me Silvester Byrd's schedule so that I can update his calendar? Thanks. -Kristine
Hi, we're meeting today at 3:45, no session next week. Will determine last week in may today
Thank you. He knows his weekly schedule. One exception, he is not available Wed., 5/29 noon-3 PM.
Not a problem. I am starting a new job end of may and my schedule is still up in the air. I should be able to give a definite schedule the last week in may.
